com.p4535992.util.sesame

Class SesameUtil28

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.p4535992.util.sesame.SesameUtil28

  • public class SesameUtil28
extends java.lang.Object
    Class of utility for Sesame Server and Owlim Server
    Author:
    4535992 Work with Seame openrdf version 2.8.0

                                                org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandlerException,
                                                java.io.IOException
        Parse the given RDF file and return the contents as a Graph
        Parameters:
        configurationFile,The - file containing the RDF data
        format, - RDFFormat of configurationFile
        defaultNamespace, - base URI of the configurationFile
        Returns:
        The contents of the file as an RDF graph

        org.openrdf.rio.RDFHandlerException

      • evaluateQueries

        public void evaluateQueries(java.io.File queryFile)
        Demonstrates query evaluation. First parse the query file. Each of the queries is executed against the prepared repository. If the printResults is set to true the actual values of the bindings are output to the console. We also count the time for evaluation and the number of results per query and output this information.
